name: Shoulder Rolls
steps: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms at your sides.
Inhale deeply and raise your shoulders up towards your ears.
Exhale and roll your shoulders backwards in a circular motion, squeezing your shoulder blades together as you do so.
Continue rolling your shoulders backwards for several repetitions.
Reverse the direction of the shoulder rolls and roll your shoulders forwards in a circular motion.
comments: Make sure to keep your head and neck relaxed while performing the exercise.
You can also perform the exercise while holding light weights to increase the resistance.
